subject: Football
Dogfighting
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Falcons were prepared to suspend quarterback Michael Vick after he was indicted on federal felony charges related to a dogfighting operation before the N.F.L. stepped in.
snippet: The Atlanta Falcons were prepared to suspend quarterback Michael Vick after he was indicted on federal felony charges related to a dogfighting operation before the N.F.L. stepped in.
